path.style: stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: red; stroke-width: 2; fill: none;
stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: blue; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 3,3; fill: none;
stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; fill: none;
stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: black; stroke-width: 2; fill: none;
